entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
